parameters.query:
INSERT INTO avatars (person_id, style_name, motion_avatar_id, preview_video_url, preview_image_url)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.person_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.style_name }}',
  '{{ $json.motion_avatar_id }}',
  {{ $json.preview_video_url ? "'" + $json.preview_video_url + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.preview_image_url ? "'" + $json.preview_image_url + "'" : 'NULL' }}
)
ON CONFLICT (motion_avatar_id) DO UPDATE SET
  style_name = EXCLUDED.style_name,
  preview_video_url = EXCLUDED.preview_video_url,
  preview_image_url = EXCLUDED.preview_image_url,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id, person_id, style_name, motion_avatar_id;

INSERT INTO client_avatars (client_id, avatar_id, is_active)
SELECT 
  'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.id }}'::uuid,
  true
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM client_avatars 
  WHERE client_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' 
  AND avatar_id = '{{ $json.id }}'
)
RETURNING avatar_id;
